languages.text: "Уж не думаешь ты, что смертный может уподобиться абсолюту закона? Мы можем лишь стремиться. Так стремись же, Соломон, большего тебе не дано".
"You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."
languages.original_text: "Уж не думаешь ты, что смертный может уподобиться абсолюту закона? Мы можем лишь стремиться. Так стремись же, Соломон, большего тебе не дано".

traits.locale_text: "You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."
"You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."
"You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."
"You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."
"You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."

languages.text: 「人間が法の完璧さを体現できるなどと思ってはいないだろう？{mf|俺|私}たちにできるのは、ただ努力することだけだ。だから努力しろ、ソロモーン。それ以上のことはできないのだから」
languages.original_text: "You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."

traits.locale_text: 「人間が法の完璧さを体現できるなどと思ってはいないだろう？{mf|俺|私}たちにできるのは、ただ努力することだけだ。だから努力しろ、ソロモーン。それ以上のことはできないのだから」

languages.text: "Ich glaubt nicht, dass ein Sterblicher die Perfektion des Gesetzes verkörpern kann, richtig? Wir können nur danach streben. So strebt denn, Solomorne. Mehr könnt Ihr nicht tun."
languages.original_text: "You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaubt nicht, dass ein Sterblicher die Perfektion des Gesetzes verkörpern kann, richtig? Wir können nur danach streben. So strebt denn, Solomorne. Mehr könnt Ihr nicht tun."

languages.text: « Vous ne pensez pas qu'un simple mortel pourrait incarner la perfection de la loi, n'est-ce pas ? Nous ne pouvons que faire de notre mieux. Alors, faites de votre mieux, Solomorne. Il n'est pas humainement possible d'en faire plus. »
languages.original_text: "You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne pensez pas qu'un simple mortel pourrait incarner la perfection de la loi, n'est-ce pas ? Nous ne pouvons que faire de notre mieux. Alors, faites de votre mieux, Solomorne. Il n'est pas humainement possible d'en faire plus. »

languages.text: «Usted no cree que un mortal pueda personificar la perfección de la ley, ¿verdad? Lo único que podemos hacer es esforzarnos. Así que esfuércese, Solomorne. Más no puede hacer».
languages.original_text: "You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."

traits.locale_text: «Usted no cree que un mortal pueda personificar la perfección de la ley, ¿verdad? Lo único que podemos hacer es esforzarnos. Así que esfuércese, Solomorne. Más no puede hacer».

languages.text: “你该不会认为，凡人有能力代行帝皇的律法吧？不，我们只能不断努力。既然如此，就不断努力吧，索罗蒙，这是你唯一能做的事情。”
languages.original_text: "You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."

traits.locale_text: “你该不会认为，凡人有能力代行帝皇的律法吧？不，我们只能不断努力。既然如此，就不断努力吧，索罗蒙，这是你唯一能做的事情。”

languages.text: "Bir fâni, kanunların mükemmeliyeti ihtiva edemez. Elden ancak çabalamak gelir. O yüzden çabala Solomorne. Bundan fazlasını yapamazsın."
languages.original_text: "You do not think a mortal can embody the perfection of the law, do you? We can only strive. So, strive, then, Solomorne. You can do no more than that."

traits.locale_text: "Bir fâninin, kanunların mükemmeliyeti ihtiva edebileceğine inanmıyorsun, değil mi? Elden ancak çabalamak gelir. O yüzden çabala Solomorne. Bundan fazlasını yapamazsın."
